title: T204 Jimmy Collins SGC 50 for trade
author: sb1

posts.post_title: T204 Jimmy Collins SGC 50 for trade
posts.post_content:
I have a real nice looking SGC 50 Jimmy Collins card for trade, looking for a Chance, Evers or Bender in the same grade or a higher grade, which I can add extra cash or other cards.

Also have several other T204's for trade, looking for many different players, the nicer the better.

Scott
